title: Angular options for TypeScript configuration files

allowEmptyCodegenFiles.description: Generate all possible generated files. This option is not used anymore.

annotateForClosureCompiler.description: Insert JSDoc type annotations needed by Closure Compiler.

compilationMode.description: Specifies the compilation mode to use.

compileNonExportedClasses.description: Whether the compiler should avoid generating code for classes that haven't been exported.

enableI18nLegacyMessageIdFormat.description: Render $localize messages with legacy format ids.

extendedDiagnostics.description: Options which control how diagnostics are emitted from the compiler.

defaultCategory.description: The category to use for configurable diagnostics which are not overridden by 'checks'.

checks.description: A map of each extended template diagnostic's name to its category.

flatModuleId.description: Preferred module id to use for importing flat module. Only meaningful when 'flatModuleOutFile' is also supplied.

flatModuleOutFile.description: When used, generates a flat module index of the given name and the corresponding flat module metadata.

forbidOrphanComponents.description: Enables the runtime check to guard against rendering a component without first loading its NgModule.

fullTemplateTypeCheck.description: Whether to type check the entire template. Superseded by 'strictTemplates'.

generateDeepReexports.description: Enables the generation of alias re-exports of directives/pipes that are visible from an NgModule from that NgModule's file.

generateExtraImportsInLocalMode.description: Generates extra imports in local compilation mode which imply the extra imports generated in full mode compilation.

i18nOutFile.description: Path to the extracted message file to emit when the xi18n operation is requested.

i18nOutFormat.description: Export format (xlf, xlf2 or xmb) when the xi18n operation is requested.

i18nOutLocale.description: Locale of the application (used when xi18n is requested).

i18nPreserveWhitespaceForLegacyExtractio.description: Whether or not to preserve whitespace when extracting messages with the legacy (View Engine) pipeline.

i18nUseExternalIds.description: Whether translation variable name should contain external message id.

onlyExplicitDeferDependencyImports.description: Specifies whether Angular compiler should rely on explicit imports via @Component.deferredImports field for @defer blocks.

onlyPublishPublicTypingsForNgModules.description: Whether the generated type definition for an NgModule will be filtered to only list those types which are publicly exported by the NgModule.

preserveWhitespaces.description: Whether to remove blank text nodes from compiled templates.

strictAttributeTypes.description: Whether to check text attributes that happen to be consumed by a directive or component.

strictContextGenerics.description: Whether to include the generic type of components when type-checking the template.

strictDomEventTypes.description: Whether to infer the type of the $event variable in event bindings to DOM events.

strictDomLocalRefTypes.description: Whether to infer the type of local references.

strictInjectionParameters.description: Whether to report an error when a parameter is supplied whose injection type cannot be determined.

strictInputAccessModifiers.description: Whether to check if the input binding attempts to assign to a restricted field (readonly, private, or protected) on the directive/component.

strictInputTypes.description: Whether to check the type of a binding to a directive/component input against the type of the field on the directive/component.

strictLiteralTypes.description: Whether object or array literals defined in templates use their inferred type, or are interpreted as 'any'.

strictNullInputTypes.description: Whether to use strict null types for input bindings for directives.

strictOutputEventTypes.description: Whether to infer the type of the $event variable in event bindings for directive outputs or animation events.

strictSafeNavigationTypes.description: Whether to use a strict type for null-safe navigation operations.

strictStandalone.description: If enabled, non-standalone declarations are prohibited and result in build errors.

strictTemplates.description: If 'true', implies all template strictness flags.

typeCheckHostBindings.description: Whether type checking of host bindings is enabled.
